aboutSection.title: About Primary Draft
aboutSection.content: Primary Draft is an interactive web app for simulating U.S. political party primary elections. Experiment with state primary election results and allocate delegates among presidential primary candidates on a United States map. Use it as an educational tool or just for fun, and experience democracy!

whatIsAPrimarySection.title: What is a primary election?
whatIsAPrimarySection.content: A primary election is how a national political party selects a nominee to run for the United States presidency. While a national party oversees and sets rules for elections, state's can have their own nuanced delegate allocation process.

content.item1: {lead} Selecting a candidate allows you to quickly allocate a majority (50.1%) of a state's popular vote with a click. "None" allows you to allocate with total freedom.
content.item2: {lead} on the map and interact with the allocation tool. Delegates are automatically calculated based on the set popular vote percentages and a state's election rules.
content.item2Lead: Click on a U.S. state or territory
content.item3: {lead} Watch the "Unallocated" row to help you keep track of yet to be distributed votes. Once 0 is reached, you won't be able to allocate any more to a candidate without taking away from another.
content.item4: {lead} A candidate is the nomination winner once they've earned a majority of total delegates, marked by the delegate count flag {flagIcon}.

content.p: There's a balance to be made between streamlining the user experience while retaining the authenticity of simulating an election process due to the nuance of state election laws. Here are some changes we've made.
content.item1: We allocate delegates in caucuses as if they were primaries.
content.item2: We allocate district level and soft delegates as if they were state-wide, at-large, hard delegates.
content.item3: We condense primary types into 2 main groups.
content.item3a: {lead} - We allocate all of a state's delegates to the candidate with the most amount of votes.
content.item3b: {lead} - We distribute delegates proportionally based on the popular vote percentiles.
